Title: Optifine
Content: Optifine should be replaced with rubidium, it's closed source nature prevents us from making compat for it

Title: Optifine
Content: You shouldn't use Optifine, it's closed soured nature prevents us from making compat for it

Title: Clockwork
Content: Clockwork is currently in a closed alpha, testers are selected by the devs and no, constantly asking doesn't help you get it in

Title: Clockwork
Content: Clockwork is currently in a closed alpha, it'll be released to the public anywhere from 2-4 weeks
